channel.title: Players keep stuff when they die, owners don't. help?

item.title: Players keep stuff when they die, owners don't. help?
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

[quote=“adrian1372, post:2, topic:381220”]Check the config first, it is in the src folder. If it says public boolean admins can drop (or whatever) at true, change it to false and compile, it may fix it. If it already is at false, then idk[/quote]ur dumb thats for admins

Read full topic

item.title: Players keep stuff when they die, owners don't. help?
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

thanks adrian that helped and I was able fix it =) now owners/admins keeps items, mods/players don’t just like it should be.
I removed the topic due to the fact that I was able to resolve the problem. thanks again Adrian.

Read full topic
item.source: Players keep stuff when they die, owners don't. help?

item.title: Players keep stuff when they die, owners don't. help?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

Check the config first, it is in the src folder. If it says public boolean admins can drop (or whatever) at true, change it to false and compile, it may fix it. If it already is at false, then idk
